article.title: Welcome to the Georgia U.S. Export Assistance Centers
article.summary: Learn more about the U.S. Export Assistance Centers of Georgia.
article.content:
Clickherefor details & registration.

​

With an international network composed of trade specialists and commercial officers in over 250 cities worldwide, the U.S. Commercial Service is in a unique position to serve the needs of Georgia exporters and help them succeed internationally. We are a federal agency that is in place solely for the purpose of helping U.S. companies export! TheAtlanta U.S. Export Assistance Centerserves North and Middle Georgia communities. TheSouth Georgia U.S. Export Assistance Centerin Savannah supports the southern half of the Peach State.

​
With over30 years of experience assisting Georgia exporters, our trade specialists provide you with the knowledge and support you need to start or expand your export markets. To request service, pleaseclick here to complete our online questionnaire.


Georgia Export Events

  • Atlanta USEAC Local Events
  • South Georgia USEAC Local Events
